title: Comparing Puritans to the Woke Is Unfair to Puritans
sub_head: The puritans opposed Christmas for theological reasons, but in no way opposed pleasure in general.
body:
In “How the Woke Stole Christmas” (Free Expression, Dec. 22), Gerard Baker might as well have quoted Lord Macaulay’s smear: “The Puritan hated bear-baiting, not because it gave pain to the bear, but because it gave pleasure to the spectators.” Mr. Baker should know that the puritans opposed Christmas for theological reasons, but in no way opposed pleasure in general.
Andrew S. Ballitch
Mansfield, Ohio
